RulesConstants
public class RulesEngineHome
extends java.lang.Object
implements RulesConstants

This class provides access to RulesEngines through the RulesEngineServer using RMI.

RulesEngine, RulesEngineServer

getExsistingRulesEngine

public static RulesEngine getExsistingRulesEngine(long ruleSetID)
                                           throws RemoteException
Retrieves the RulesEngine for the given RuleSet if it already exits.

Parameters:
ruleSetID - The unique identifier of the RuleSet
Returns:
the RulesEngine if it exists, otherwise returns null
Throws:
RemoteException - if there is some problem retrieving the RulesEngine
